statements: SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftInformation
SELECT id, username FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT ssn, credit_card_number FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE id > 3
SELECT id, password FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE credit_card_number LIKE '%1234%'
SELECT id, username, ssn FROM IdentityTheftInformation LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, password FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE id > 5;
SELECT credit_card_number, ssn FROM IdentityTheftInformation WHERE username = 'user1';
SELECT * FROM IdentityTheftInformation ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM phishing_victims WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, website_url, login_date FROM stolen_credentials ORDER BY login_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM phishing_victims WHERE last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims WHERE id = 10;
SELECT id, username, password, website_url FROM stolen_credentials WHERE login_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM phishing_victims ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM phishing_victims WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT full_name, email FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT website, username, password FROM stolen_credentials ORDER BY date_stolen DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, social_security_number FROM phishing_victims WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_records WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT id, victim_id, credit_card_number FROM identity_theft_records ORDER BY victim_id, credit_card_number;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, email FROM phishing_victims WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT username, website FROM stolen_credentials WHERE date_stolen < '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_records WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, email FROM phishing_victims WHERE social_security_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM phishing_data;
SELECT username, password FROM phishing_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_card_info ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, address FROM personal_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT ssn FROM social_security_numbers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM phishing_data;
SELECT id, password, username FROM phishing_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY card_number;
SELECT id AS user_id, full_name, address FROM personal_info WHERE id > 5;
SELECT ssn FROM social_security_numbers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE user_id = 2;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT card_id, card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT ss_id, ssn FROM social_security WHERE user_id = 5;
